questions.question_text: Tyār bād Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj paryant pratyek guruonī mūrtio padharāvavī tathā pote pratyaksh sevyā hoy te guruonī ______ padharāvavī. (62)
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 62 is: Tyār bād Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj paryant pratyek guruonī mūrtio padharāvavī tathā pote pratyaksh sevyā hoy te guruonī mūrtio padharāvavī.

questions.question_text: Madhye tu sthāpayet tatra hyakshara-Purushottamau | Swāminam hi Guņātītam Mahārājam cha tat param ||
questions.explanation: This shlok is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 61.

questions.question_text: Āgamyatām hi pūjārtham āgamyatām ______. Sānnidhyād darshanād divyāt saubhāgyam vardhate mama || 65
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 65 is: Āgamyatām hi pūjārtham āgamyatām mad-ātmataha | Sānnidhyād darshanād divyāt saubhāgyam vardhate mama ||

questions.question_text: Uttishtha Sahajānanda Shri-Hare Purushottama | Guņātītāʼkshara Brahmann-uttishtha krupayā guro ||
questions.explanation: This shlok is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 64.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād sthir chitte tathā mahimā sāthe mūrtionā darshan karatā karatā Swāminārāyan mantrano jāp karatā ______ feravavī. (66-67)
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 66-67 is: Tyār bād sthir chitte tathā mahimā sāthe mūrtionā darshan karatā karatā Swāminārāyan mantrano jāp karatā māļā feravavī.

questions.question_text: Sthāpayech-chitra-mūrtīsh-cha shuchi vastropari tataha | Darshanam syād yathā samyak tathā hi bhakti-bhāvataha ||
questions.explanation: This shlok is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 60.

questions.question_text: jevu paroksh Bhagwānnā Rām-Krushņādik avatārnu māhātmya jāņe chhe tathā Nārad, Sanakādik, Shukjī, Jad-Bharat, Hanuman, Uddhav ityādik je parokșh sādhu tenu jevu māhātmya jāņe chhe tevu ja pratyaksh evā je Bhagwān tathā te Bhagwānnā ______ sādhu tenu māhātmya samaje tene kalyānnā mārgmā kāīye samajavu bākī rahyu nahī.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 21 is: jevu paroksh Bhagwānnā Rām-Krushņādik avatārnu māhātmya jāņe chhe tathā Nārad, Sanakādik, Shukjī, Jad-Bharat, Hanuman, Uddhav ityādik je parokșh sādhu tenu jevu māhātmya jāņe chhe tevu ja pratyaksh evā je Bhagwān tathā te Bhagwānnā bhakta sādhu tenu māhātmya samaje tene kalyānnā mārgmā kāīye samajavu bākī rahyu nahī.

questions.question_text: Swāminārāyan nāmnā mantra jevo bījo koī mantra āj baļiyo nathī ne e mantre kāļā nāgnu pan zer na chade ne e mantre vishay ūdī jāy chhe, brahmarūp thây chhe ne kāļ, karma, māyānu bandhan chhūtī jāy chhe, evo bahu baliyo e mantra chhe. Māțe nirantar bhajan karavu.
questions.explanation: This quote is from Swamini Vato 1/153.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād ______ shlok bolīne Mahārāj tathā Guruonu āhvān karavu. Be hāth joạī dāsbhāve namaskār karavā. (63)
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 63 is: Tyār bād āhvān shlok bolīne Mahārāj tathā Guruonu āhvān karavu. Be hāth joạī dāsbhāve namaskār karavā.

questions.question_text: Game tevo pāpī hoy ne ant same jo tene 'Swāminārāyan evā nāmnu uchchāran thây to te sarva pāp thakī chhūtīne Brahmamoholne vishe nivās kare
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 56.
